trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gypsum
There were no other sightings in Gypsum on or around October 31st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were headed to get a burger around about 8pm. Driving from Gypsum to Eagle. It was dark and I all of a sudden saw something blueish green flying toward us, overhead almost horizontally but maybe at about a 150 degree angle. It was beautiful. I asked my son age 4 if he saw it and he said he didn't. I think when I actually really noticed it, it almost took me to look underneath my visor area for it was directly above us. It was huge though. I thought it was probably a meteor. So cool. But when I heard about the Needles, California sighting on the history channel, and they discribed that sighting as turqoise, I realized what I saw looked alot like the one they saw in Needles.
Summary: Blue green oblong fireball flying to earth in about 150 angle.
